versions.notes: Mythic tone with tight POV, rich fantasy and epic arcs, drawing the reader in with hidden twists and rich intricate plots

Mythic tone with tight POV, rich fantasy and epic arcs, drawing the reader in with hidden twists and rich intricate plots, the reader may often be suprised by a reveal that was hinted at but never truly given a stage until the importance of the minor detail become clear

Mythic tone with tight POV, rich fantasy and epic arcs, drawing the reader in with hidden twists and rich intricate plots, the reader may often be suprised by a reveal that was hinted at but never truly given a stage until the importance of the minor detail become clear, always starts each new chapter/scene clean and never repeats work from previous context
